articles.title: Big White Ski Resort bracing for possible labour shortage - Global News
articles.description: The resort typically relies heavily on workers from Australia, New Zealand and Europe, but getting those workers here has proved challenging.
articles.content:
While snow is starting to accumulate at Big White Ski Resort east of Kelowna, the same can’t be said for the number of workers needed for this upcoming winter season.
